message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a limited time. I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested, but $150 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend right now.  Would you be willing to go down to $100?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand your concerns, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for 130. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product!
I appreciate you coming down, Alice, but $130 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  How about we split the difference and go with $115?

I understand where you're coming from, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as 115. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for 125. It's a great price, and I think you'll really love the product!
